rukus.text: (napiye!) Niccayamaka nam inta kur'anaic ciritu ciritakave um'mitu irakki vaikkirom
akave, umatu iraivanin kattalaiyai (perruk kolla) nir poruttiruppiraka. Avarkalilulla pavikalaiyum, nanri kettavarkalaiyum nir pinparratir
kalaiyilum malaiyilum unkal iraivanin tirunamattai(k kuri) ninaivu kuruviraka
iravilum, avanukkuc ciram panintu vananki, iravu nerattil netuneram avanait tuti ceytu kontiruppiraka
niccayamaka inta makkal im'maiyai virumpi, avarkalukku munnirukkum (marumaiyin) katinamana nalaip purakkanittu vitukinranar
namtan avarkalaip pataittom. Namtan avarkalutaiya amaippaiyum urutippatuttinom. Nam natinal (avarkalai) marri avarkalaip ponra marravarkalai (avarkal itattil) amarttivituvom
niccayamaka itu oru nallupatecamakum. Virumpiyavar tan iraivan pakkam cellakkutiya (nerana) valiyaip palamakap pitittuk kollavum
Eninum, allah natinal tavira ninkal (etaiyum) virumpa mutiyatu. Niccayamaka allah (unkal anaivarin tanmaikalaiyum) nankarintavanaka, nanamutaiyavanaka irukkiran
(akave, unkalil) avan virumpiyavarkalait tan arulil pukutti vitukiran. Aniyayakkararkalukkut tunpuruttum vetanaiyaittan tayarpatutti vaittirukkiran
